Projects.title: Modern SharePoint Online Portal
Projects.Description: Development of a Modern SharePoint Landing page with a tiled UI with Fluent UI.The backend was Azure functions and database was Azure SQL.

Projects.title: Reporting Hub
Projects.Description: A Reporting Hub with Primary intentions to analyze farm wide reports for Migration and thereon track the usage of Workspaces by users across the globe.Had leverage Power BI capabilities to display rich UI interface and provide flexibility.

Projects.title: Custom Configurable Workflow Engine- SharePoint
Projects.Description: Developed a highly Configurable sequential workflow for document/workitem approval.Most of the development was done using client side features of SharePoint(JSOM/CSOM).

tags.name: .NET
tags.description: Have been working since as early as .NET v2 and have worked across spectrum of all the .NET frameworks along with .NET Core.
